indicator_name: Number of organisations that have joined the More Sustainable Barcelona network
graph_title: Number of organisations that have joined the More Sustainable Barcelona network
barcelona_target: By 2030, the More Sustainable Barcelona network will have 3,000 member organisations committed to the 2030 Agenda
national_indicator_available: Number of organisations that have joined the More Sustainable Barcelona network
target_line_2030: Achieve that the More Sustainable Barcelona network reaches more than 3,000 member organisations committed to the 2030 Agenda
target_name: Ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 894kB)

es.target_name: Asegurar que las personas de todo el mundo tengan la información y la concienciación pertinentes para un desarrollo y unos estilos de vida sostenibles, en armonía con la naturaleza
